content.rendered:
Directed by Om Raut

Written by Prakash Kapadia. Om Raut. Prakash Kapadia. Om Raut. Prakash Kapadia. Kirti Deghatak

Cast Ajay Devgn (Tanhaji Malusare). Saif Ali Khan (Udaybhan Singh Rathod). Sharad Kelkar (Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj). Kajol (Savitribai Malusare). Padmavati Rao (Rajmata Jijao Saheb). Shashank Shende (Shelar Mama). Neha Sharma (Kamla Devi). Vipul Gupta (Jagat Singh). Devdutta Nage (Suryaji Malusare). Ajinkya Deo (Chandraji Pisal). Kailash Waghmare (Chultiya). Luke Kenny (Emperor Aurangzeb). Yuri Suri (Mirza Raje Jai SIngh). Aamir Yaseen (Danishmand Khan). Nissar Khan (Beshak Khan). Rajveer Ankur Singh (Khaibar Khan). Jagannath Nivangune (Tanhaji’s father (as Jagannath Niwangune)). Trishla Patel (Tanhaji’s mother). Bhagyashree Nhalve (Suryaji’s Wife). Hardik Sangani (Gondya). Angad Mhaskar (Pant). Shivraj Walvekar (Pratap Rao). Nikhat Khan (Uday Bhan’s Mother). Arush Nand (Raiba). Antima Sharma (Gidya’s Mother / Nafeesa). Elakshi A Gupta (Soyrabai (as Elakshi Morey)). Niranjan Jadhao (Trimbak Rao). Prasanna Ketkar (Ghersarnaik). Ramchandran Singh (Raja Kaka). Harsh Sharma (Young Taanaji). Devendra Gaikwad (Mal Patil / Raiba’s Father-in-Law). Myrah Dandekar (Raiba’s Wife). Ramazan Bulut (Iranian King). Tufail Khan (Munawar Khan). Mridul Kumar Sinha (Noor Khan Baig (as Mridul Kumar)). Sandeep Juwatkar (Gujar). Singh Dhananjay (Udaybhan’s Spy). Ajay Kumar Nain (Rajput Vakil). Dhairyasheel Gholap (Shiru Bhau). Rajesh Aher (Raja Sangram Singh). Azzy Bagria (Friend (as Bagria Azzy)). Nitin Bansode (Udaybhan’s Spy (Khabri)). Cricknowle (Rudrash). Swapnil Dhondge (Satya). Nitesh Kalbande (Divya Malusare Maratha). Tareeq Ahmed Khan (Soldier). Rishabh Khanna (Viraj chand). Narreshh Malikk (Soldier (as Naresh Malik)).Kiran Rathod. Tufail Khan Rigoo (Munawar Khan). Ankit Saxena (Veer pratap). Harsh Sharma (Young Tanhaji). Rajat Sharma (Soldier).Dilbagh Singh

Languages Hindi

Producers Ajay Devgn. Hetvi Karia. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Sanjay Paraswani. Vikrant Sharma.

Production Ajay Devgn Ffilms. T-Series
